name: Intelligence Network
perks: Getting the chosen result on at least one resolution grants 10 Landsraad Standing every Council
+100% Agent recruitment speed

childs.name: Cruel Reputation
perks: Using an operation on a faction in Conflict grants 25% of its Solari cost as Influence
Unlocks the Political Agreement Treaty

childs.name: Counter Measures
perks: After every Council, 1 Landsraad Guard appear near Carthag per 100 Influence spent, up to 3
+1 Agent slot in Counterintelligence

childs.name: Landsraad Whispers
perks: Agents assined on a Landsraad Information slot produce +2 Intel
Unlocks the Landsraad Quarters Building in Carthag
+1 Agent slot in Landsraad Information

childs.name: Insider Trading
perks: +20% CHOAM Share selling price
Selling CHOAM Shares grants 1 Influence per Share

+200% Agent recruitment speed

childs.name: Enhanced Questionning
perks: Oppressed Villages grant +1 Intel production
Unlocks the Interrogation Center Buidling in Carthag

childs.name: Spying Mastery
